line_items.description: CLIENT STATES THAT THE DRIVERS SIDE DOOR ELECTRONICS DO NOT OPERATE CHECK AND ADVISE
line_items.tech_notes: LEFT ENGINE JUNCTION BOX TO REAR JUNCTION BOX CIRCUIT SHORT CIRCUIT TO GROUND. Found circuit from connector C13H-13 to left engine junction box at C1BB01A-15 shorted to ground where driver rests his/her left foot underneath the carpet. Performed harness repair. Driver door electronics now working correctly.

line_items.description: CLIENT STATES LOW BATTERY WARNING LIGHT COMES ON THE CLUSTER CHECK AND ADVISE
line_items.tech_notes: START UP BATTERY FAILURE. Battery failed in-vehicle and out-of-vehicle tests. Replaced start-up battery. Low battery message no longer displayed.

line_items.description: CUSTOMER STATES RESET ALL TIRE PRESSURES
line_items.tech_notes: TIRE PSI VALUES. LEFT 37PSI FRONT RIGHT 37PSI REAR LEFT 37PSI REAR RIGHT 37PSI

notes: Fuse blew again after driving 2 miles - recurring electrical short issue
